name: Tobi Vail
description: '''Tobi Celeste Vail''' (born July 20, 1969) is an American [[independent music]]ian, [[music critic]] and [[feminist]] activist from [[Olympia, Washington]]. She was a central figure in the [[riot grrl]] scene—she coined the spelling of "grrl"—and she started the [[zine]] ''Jigsaw''. A drummer, guitarist and singer, she was a founding member of the band [[Bikini Kill]]. Vail has collaborated in several other bands figuring in the [[Olympia music scene]]. Vail writes for [[eMusic]].
